Leaves: Light green blades 2-20 cm long, flat, slightly hairy, with smooth edges and straight point.
Flowers: Green compact cylindrical spike, partly enclosed by a single leaf.
FruitSeeds: Spikelets green with long awn, tightly compacted in spike. With cylindrical seeds in groups of 3.
DistinguishingFeatures: Extremely similar to Barley grass (*Hordeum leporinum*).
